TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示一个 字段，该字段可使用户按页码选择页。

span.span: Represents a field that enables users to select a page by page number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在控件中显示导航控件 。The class displays navigation controls in a control. 控件可用于对由实现接口的控件 （如控件）显示的数据进行分页 。The controls can be used to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 对象将页码显示为按钮，用户可以单击这些按钮以移至特定页面。The object displays page numbers as buttons that users can click to move to specific a page. 该控件还显示下一页和上一页按钮，使用户能够访问比控件显示的数据更多的数据页。The control also displays next-page and previous-page buttons that enable users to access more pages of data than the ones that are displayed by the control. 您可以 使用下表中列出的属性来自定义对象的外观。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the properties that are listed in the following table. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||当前页码的 CSS 类。The CSS class for the current page number.| ||下一页按钮和上一页按钮的 CSS 类。The CSS class for the next-page and previous-page buttons.| ||表示页码的按钮的 CSS 类。The CSS class for the buttons that represent the page numbers.| 您可以使用 属性来选择将显示的按钮类型。You can use the property to select the type of button that will be displayed. 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型Button type|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 对象内部的控件在呈现时不 含间断空格。The controls inside the object are rendered with non-breaking spaces between them. 如果要自定义此行为，可使用 属性。If you want to customize this behavior, you can use the property. 可以 通过将属性设置为来隐藏控件中的对象 `false` 。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 您无法控制下一页按钮和上一页按钮的可见性。You cannot control the visibility of the next-page and previous-page buttons. 如果关联的数据控件具有可供显示的其他页，则这些控件将由控件显示。They are displayed by the control if the associated data control has additional pages available to display. 您可以使用 属性来指定对象中显示的按钮数 。You can use the property to specify how many buttons are displayed in a object. 每个按钮对应于一个页码。Each button corresponds to a page number. 您可以通过设置属性来设置下一页按钮的文本 。You can set the text of the next-page button by setting the property. 您可以通过使用属性来设置上一页按钮的文本 。You can set the text of the previous-page button by using the property. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则必须提供将为下一页按钮和上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image that will be displayed for the next-page and previous page buttons. 可以通过设置和属性来执行此操作 。You do this by setting the and properties. 在这种情况下，相应的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。In that case, the corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 例如，属性指定的文本 将显示为下一页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象对控件中显示的数据进行分页 。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/CS/NumericPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/VB/NumericPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数通常在向动态创建的控件添加字段时使用 。This constructor is typically used when you add fields to a dynamically created control. 若要将 对象动态添加到 控件，请创建新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到控件的字段集合 。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数将对象动态添加 到 控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/CS/NumericPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/VB/NumericPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ButtonCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ButtonCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 对象中显示的按钮的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 要在 对象中显示的按钮的数目。

span.span: The number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 默认值为 5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在对象中显示的按钮的数目 。Use the property to specify the number of buttons to display in a object. 每个按钮对应于一个页码。Each button corresponds to a page number. 如果 对象具有的页数多于为指定的数目 ，则控件将显示下一页按钮，用户可以使用该按钮访问下一组页面。If the object has more pages than the number specified for , the control displays a next-page button that lets users access the next set of pages. 对象只显示现有页码的按钮。The object displays buttons only for existing page numbers. 如果 对象的显示页数少于为指定的数字 ，则控件显示的按钮数少于此属性指定的数目。If the object has fewer pages to show than the number specified for , the control shows fewer buttons than the number specified by this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来更改控件的对象中显示的页按钮的默认数目 。The following example shows how to use the property to change the default number of page buttons that are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 属性被设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 1.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在页导航字段中显示的按钮类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型值Button type value|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 如果将 属性设置为 ，则必须为下一页按钮和上一页按钮提供图像的 URL。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image for the next-page and previous page buttons. 为此，可以使用 和 属性。To do this, you can use the and properties. 相应的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。The corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 例如，属性指定的文本 将显示为下一页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. 如果 属性不是空字符串或 `null` ，则对象将 忽略属性的值 。If the property is not an empty string or `null`, the object ignores the value of the property. 在这种情况下，该 控件用于创建按钮。In that case, the control is used to create the buttons. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定图像按钮显示在 控件的对象中 。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置当前页码样式的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the current page number.

value.span: 用于设置浏览器中当前页码的样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the current page number in the browser.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定用于给对象的样式的 CSS 类，该 对象表示当前选定的页的页码。Use the property to specify the CSS class that is used to style the object that represents the number of the page that is currently selected. 无论浏览器如何，属性始终呈现为 `class` 属性。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 在不支持 CSS 的浏览器中，设置 属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定一个 CSS 类，以在控件的对象中对当前页码进行样式 。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the current page number in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void HandleEvent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 处理 对象中发生的事件并执行适当的操作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 当单击控件中的某个按钮时，方法使用它来处理在对象中发生的事件。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法检查 参数中包含的对象的属性 `e` ，然后执行相应的操作。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出了对象提供的按钮 以及单击按钮时执行的操作。The following table lists the buttons provided by the object and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|操作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |NumberNumber|页码Page number|导航到相应的数据页。Navigates to the corresponding page of data.| |上一页Previous page||显示前一组页码，并导航到该集中的最后一个数据页。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the last page of data in that set.| |下一页Next page||显示前一组页码，并导航到该集中的第一个数据页。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the first page of data in that set.|

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 为 对象中的下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 ，使用 属性指定为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button. 图像可以是浏览器支持的任何文件格式，如 .jpg、.gif、.bmp 和 .png。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browser, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值，则 设置属性将 不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为控件的对象中的下一页按钮显示图像 。The following example shows how to display an image for the next-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the next-page button.

value.span: 为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the next-page button.

value.span: 默认值为 "..."。

span.span: The default is "...".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 ，将在属性中指定的文本用作 图像的替换文字。When the property is set to , the text specified in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以通过使用设计器工具自动保存到资源文件中。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义为控件中页导航字段的下一页按钮显示的文本 。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the next-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 用于为页导航字段的下一页按钮和上一页按钮设置样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当页总数大于属性中指定的值时，下一页和上一页按钮将由类显示，以允许用户访问其他数据页 。The next-page and previous-page buttons are displayed by the class to let users access other pages of data when the total number of pages is greater than the value specified in the property. 无论浏览器如何，属性始终呈现为 `class` 属性。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 在不支持 CSS 的浏览器中，设置 属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定一个 CSS 类来为控件的对象中的下一页按钮和上一页按钮指定样式 。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the next-page and previous-page buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个级联样式表 (CSS) 类，用于为页导航字段的页码按钮设置样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 用于为页导航字段的页码按钮设置样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页码按钮由 类显示，使用户可以直接导航到各个页面。Page-number buttons are displayed by the class to enable users to navigate directly to individual pages. 属性指定的 CSS 类 应用于对象显示的所有页码 ，当前所选页面除外。The CSS class specified by the property is applied to all page numbers that are displayed by the object, except for the page that is currently selected. 当前所选页面使用属性指定的 CSS 类 。The page currently selected page uses the CSS class that is specified by the property. 无论浏览器如何，属性始终呈现为 `class` 属性。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 在不支持 CSS 的浏览器中，设置 属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定一个 CSS 类，以在控件的对象中对页码按钮进行样式 。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the page number buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 为 对象中的上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 ，使用 属性指定为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button. 该图像可以是任何受浏览器支持的文件格式，如 .jpg、.gif、.bmp 和 .png。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browsers, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值，则 设置属性将 不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为控件的对象中的上一页按钮显示图像 。The following example shows how to display an image for the previous-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为上一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 为上一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 默认值为 "..."。

span.span: The default is "...".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 ，该属性中的文本将用作 图像的替换文字。When the property is set to , the text in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以通过使用设计器工具自动保存到资源文件中。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义为控件中的页导航字段的上一页按钮显示的文本 。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the previous-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将在控件之间呈现非换行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果在控件之间呈现非换行空格，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定是否在 ` ` 对象的控件（ 如页面按钮）之间呈现 HTML 字符) 引用 (不换行空格。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character reference) will be rendered between the controls of the object, such as the page buttons. 如果需要更好地控制通过级联样式表 (CSS) 类创建的布局，则可以将设置 为 `false` 。If you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes, you can set to `false`.
